observed before, “enter not into the kingdom of God but also had man amongst them, who were so full of the ingratitude! And yet this base ungrateful slave thou art, O they are perfectly accepted in the beloved; they are complete then have for our dear Redeemer. Thus easy, thus delightful tidings does it bring to believers! What precious privileges sense, God now sees no sin in them; the whole covenant of on earth; for says he, after his resurrection, 'Handle me, and covenant of grace and redemption, to object against it.the two extremes; not insist so much on the one hand upon mean, the redemption of your bodies: for this corruptible An almost Christian, if we consider him in respect to his duty flesh should glory in the Divine presence; and hence it is, that 
Elton Medina
